value.0:
*As you approach the King, the courtroom falls quiet.*

What can King Wolfpelt do for you, speck?
You are nothing more than a speck in the grand scheme of the divine plan. I will entertain your conversations as long as it satisfies my own desires.
I am a Warlock.
I have created a pact with a higher being, to fulfill their goals I have bestowed upon me powerful magicks.
No. When we arrived on this island this Castle was already here. From what Archdruidess Neris said, it used to be the site of a Dragon's Hoard.

This island was once protected by a Copper Dragon, nothing besides from it lived on this island aside from the natural wildlife. When the Black Dragon Vazurim arrived with his Cult of Death, they killed it and enslaved it to their dark magicks. This happened many years before our arrival to the surface.
*The King chuckles at that*
This is Anguish. His name was not given to us by anyone but the Drow Matriarch he began to devour who used that word to describe the sensation of being eaten alive.
I am King Wolfpelt. My first name faded to existence when I was bestowed divine purpose. I am the Liberator, the Scourge of the Underdark and the Master of Worgs.
Liberator is what my followers call me. Scourge of the Underdark is what the Drow call me. Master of Worgs is what Archdruidess Neris calls me.

During the war with Archdruidess Neris, a very powerful Archdruidess, she was unable to control our Worgs in battle. We have bred them with loyalty so imposed in to their bodies that not even the most fabled of Archdruids can control them. It was our primary boon in keeping the stalemate until we arranged a deal of peace.
We have slain many Drow in our time. We have decimated small outposts and destroyed the entire Slave district of Karsoluthiyl. None have managed to withstand our wrath.
A Drow city, located underground west of Baldur's Gate.

I have liberated hundreds if not thousands of Goblinoid, Orcish and Giant kind from the hands of Drow. My ilk have a divine duty coming in the distant future and the more I have freed, the more we have to fight with.
I won't go further discussing that with a speck.

I have been bestowed power from a source that wishes me to release my kin and their allies from the hands of those who enslave them. I will do so with the most destructive of violence to prevent them from being enslaved further.
I've got to go, sorry to bother you.
Speck?
What's up with your hands?
I see.
What's a Warlock?
Oh! Interesting!
Did you build this castle?
Dragon Hoard?
Any gold left?
That's a BIG Worg
I'll leave that pupper alone, gotcha.
Who are you?
How did you obtain those titles?
Inquire about the Master of Worgs title.
Interesting.
Inquire about the Scourge of the Underdark title.
Karsoluthiyl?
I see.
Inquire about the Liberator title.
Divine duty?
Divine Purpose?
I see.
